title: About
description: Learn about my journey as a Senior Software Engineer, my technical skills, educational background, and professional experience at companies like Doctolib, Shopify, and Klarna.

skills.title: Backend Development
skills.description: Node.js, Ruby on Rails, REST APIs

experience.description: Part of a cross-functional team working on electronic prescriptions for German healthcare practitioners.

Part of a cross-functional team working on various projects as part of the Merchant Services organisation for retail merchants. Led a project related to staff management on the Point of Sale app and regularly updated relevant stakeholders. Mentored new hires and demoed new features for team.

Part of a cross-functional team building the web app for merchant onboarding flow and KYC. Worked on a task force to improve merchant portal UI/UX. Promoted to senior software engineer after 2 years, worked on constructing and maintaining Merchant Onboarding Platform monorepo. Mentored new hires and conducted knowledge sharing sessions for team.
Part of a small cross-functional team building a web app for club membership management.

education.degree: B.Sc. in Computer Science and Engineering
education.details: Bachelor thesis: Multi-Platform Voucher Module for Mobile Apps, Zoobe GmbH, Berlin, Germany
